artist: Artist: Patrick Procktor; Author: Samuel Taylor Coleridge; Etcher: Charles Newington et al. at Tisiphone Etching, Ltd.; Publisher: Editions Alecto of America Limited , London

provenance: Martin S. Ackermann Foundation, New York; given to MIA, 1979.
title: The Rime of the Ancient Mariner
